alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Sioux County through 445 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Lake Alice, or 14 miles north of Scottsbluff, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Sioux County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
